steps.title: Visit Morgan Freeman’s official Facebook page.
steps.content: Visit Morgan Freeman’s official Facebook page. Visit the Facebook page to make a post or send a message. The page is followed by a lot of people, so be persistent. There is no guarantee that Morgan Freeman is responsible for each post or that he will see your comments. The page is at https://www.facebook.com/MorganFreeman/ . [1] X Research source You can comment on each post and respond to other commenters as long as you maintain a friendly attitude. Avoid filling the comments with tens of repetitive or off-topic posts. Morgan Freeman does not have a verified Twitter or Instagram page, so don’t be fooled by the fake accounts.

steps.title: Speak with Morgan Freeman’s agent.
steps.content: Speak with Morgan Freeman’s agent. The quickest way to get in touch with Morgan Freeman is by calling the agent listed on the Revelations Entertainment website. Currently, he is Fred Spektor at the Creative Artists Agency. Place a call to the agency only if you have a business matter to discuss. Try calling 1-424-288-2000 or visiting http://www.caa.com/ . Revelations Entertainment notes that Morgan Freeman prefers that you give to his foundation instead of sending him gifts.

steps.title: Find out where Morgan Freeman is filming.
steps.content: Find out where Morgan Freeman is filming. Since he is still active in making films and movies, you may be able to find Morgan Freeman at these events. Look out for any news documenting when filming takes place. Local newspapers usually post this information, and you may get a chance to talk to him by going there. Chances are you won’t be able to enter the filming unless you work there. You may be able to stand outside of it and hope Morgan Freeman makes an appearance. For example, the Clarion Ledger in Mississippi and the SF Gate in California have reported these events.

steps.title: Travel to film festivals and movie premiers.
steps.content: Travel to film festivals and movie premiers. Morgan Freeman sometimes appears at these events to promote his work. Read the online announcements for these events, then check the film and guest list. Look for Morgan Freeman’s name and the title of whatever film he was involved with. This information is posted at sites like Variety and Deadline. You can sometimes get into these events by contacting the company holding the event or by buying tickets online. These events happen in big cities like New York and Los Angeles, so you may need to travel. Tickets can cost as little as $20 USD for some festivals and several hundred dollars for big premiers. steps.title: Hang out in a town Morgan Freeman is in.
steps.content: Hang out in a town Morgan Freeman is in. When he travels, such as while filming a show, spend some time outside. You may encounter him and get a chance to speak to him. Watch Twitter, Facebook, and other social media sites, since other people will post information on where he has been sighted. Morgan Freeman has homes in New York City and Charleston, Mississippi, so you may find him there when he isn’t working.

steps.title: Visit his blues club in Mississippi.
steps.content: Visit his blues club in Mississippi. Morgan Freeman is part-owner of the Ground Zero Blues Club in Clarksdale, Mississippi. You aren’t likely to find him there, but he may stop in from time to time. If you’re in the area, it might be worth trying if all else fails. The club’s address is 387 Delta Avenue, Clarksdale, MS 38614. You can contact the club at 662-621-9009 or groundzerogm@cableone.net.

steps.title: Book Morgan Freeman for a speaking event.
steps.content: Book Morgan Freeman for a speaking event. You can do this by getting in touch with his agent. There is a chance you can convince Morgan Freeman to come and speak at your event. Since he is busy with filming and other ventures, this is rare, but if you really want to contact him, it is worth a shot. He might make an appearance for a charity event or an educational event his company is interested in filming. This can be a very expensive option, so you may need help from others. It helps if you can invite him to a large event like a school assembly or business conference.
